channel.title: Ephemeris on Harsh Kishorani
channel.description: Recent content in Ephemeris on Harsh Kishorani

item.title: Livesat GNSS
item.author: hkishorani7@gmail.com (Harsh Kishorani)
item.description: A technical deep dive into how I use Android raw GNSS data and broadcast ephemeris to compute live satellite positions, covering time systems, anomaly solving, orbital corrections, ECEF transformation, and geodetic conversion for 3D visualization.
